an10.96:2.3: kvettha → ko’ttha (bj); ko tettha (si); kvattha (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
an10.96:14.1: diṭṭhi → diṭṭhigatā (sabbattha) | yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhiadhiṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhisamuṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhisamugghāto → yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā adhiṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ samugghāto (sya-all); yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhāna adhiṭṭhāna pariyuṭṭhāna samuṭṭhāna samugghāto (pts-vp-pli1ed)
